directions: In a 2 quart saucepan over medium heat melt butter and stir in rice and onion.  Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until rice turns golden brown, about 8 to 10 minutes.

Slowly add water, green chiles and chicken bouillon.  Bring mixture to a boil, reduce heat and cover.  Simmer until rice is tender, about 25 to 30 minutes.  Stir in cheese, olives, pimientos and parsley.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can diced green chiles, drained
1/2 (4 ounce) jar diced pimento peppers, drained
title: Cheesy Confetti Rice
